actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to reduce the amount of the reserve requirement on insured accounts in Federal savings and loan associations.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to reduce the amount of the reserve requirement on insured accounts in Federal savings and loan associations to four percent from five percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to reduce the amount of the reserve requirement on insured accounts in Federal savings and loan associations.
